title: Drug Dealer Simulator 2
description:
Welcome to the early 2000s! You are Eddie, and a lifestyle of bad choices made you an outlaw seeking refuge. Don’t worry tho, Isla Sombra is the perfect place for fugitives like you Chained Together
You’re not planning to just surrender and stay there forever though. Prove your worth, use your talents and get your life back! Making a fortune along the way won’t hurt either

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G or equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon RX 570 or equivalent
